document.full_text: lionsgate is partnering with groupon to sell half-price $6.00 tickets for "the lincoln lawyer," starring matthew mcconaughey, marisa tomei and ryan phillippe. the film is opening wide this friday.
document.title: lionsgate teams with groupon on "lincoln lawyer"
lines_and_colors: lionsgate is partnering with groupon to sell half-price $6.00 tickets for "the lincoln lawyer," starring matthew mcconaughey, marisa tomei and ryan phillippe. the film is opening wide this friday.
